About me

I am currently pursuing a PhD in Aerospace Engineering at the University of Michigan. My research is focused on predictive modeling and uncertainty quantification for electric propulsion applications. Member of the Joint Advanced Propulsion Institute (JANUS), a NASA space technology research institute pursuing high-power electric propulsion thrusters for deep-space missions.
